slides.title: Styling Tables
slides.content: # Styling Tables üé® CSS makes tables look much better. ## Zebra Stripes `tr:nth-child(even) {background-color: #f2f2f2;}` ## Hover Effect `tr:hover {background-color: #ddd;}`

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Summary üìù

Tables are essential for data presentation.

## Key Takeaways

- ‚úÖ `<table>` creates the table.
- ‚úÖ `<tr>` is a row, `<td>` is a cell.
- ‚úÖ `<th>` creates header cells.
- ‚úÖ `colspan` and `rowspan` merge cells.
- ‚úÖ `<thead>`, `<tbody>`, `<tfoot>` organize structure.
- ‚úÖ Always use CSS for styling (borders, padding, colors).
